description:
*Timed changed from 7pm to 7.30pm*

Online Q&A with an expert panel of Microsoft MVP data engineers to find out the latest about the Microsoft Data Platform and ask your questions.

Panelists:

Simon Whiteley
https://www.linkedin.com/in/simon-whiteley-uk/

Craig Porteous
https://www.linkedin.com/in/craigporteous/

Heini Ilmarinen
https://www.linkedin.com/in/heini-ilmarinen-744772133/

Cathrine Wilhelmsen
https://www.linkedin.com/in/cathrinewilhelmsen/

Welcome back to Data Bristol! We are looking forward to in-person events, but until we can host them, we will do some online events to touch base with you all and catch up with some of our awesome speakers.

It would be great to hear some of your questions in advance so we can prepare some discussions with our panelists. Please send us a message with anything you'd like to ask.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

The zoom link is available when you RSVP. The passcode will be send out just before the event.

Thanks!
John, Anna and the team.
title: Microsoft Data Engineering - Panel Q&A
